Title: Appropriates funds to the city of Yonkers fire department for a hazardous materials emergency response unit; appropriation
Summary: Establishes and appropriates funding for a Westchester county hazardous materials emergency response demonstration unit to be located within the city of Yonkers under the jurisdiction of the commissioner of the city of Yonkers fire department in cooperation with other fire departments; appropriates $1,498,623 therefor.
LawCode: Add ยง209-gg, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to establishing a hazardous materials emergency response unit demonstration project within the county of Westchester and making an appropriation therefor
